title: Remove Quiz section side photo and collapse layout

requirements.summary: Remove the Quiz section photo and all related fallback UI/state so no quiz-side image renders on any breakpoint.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/sections/QuizSection.tsx` no longer renders the `QuizImage` component (or any `` for the quiz photo) in either the mobile or desktop layouts.
The Quiz section no longer displays the fallback message "Photo could not be loaded" (or any other quiz-photo placeholder/fallback UI), because the quiz photo is not rendered at all.
Any quiz-photo-specific state/imports (e.g., `imageError` state and `Heart` import used only for the quiz photo fallback) are removed if they are no longer needed.
The Quiz section remains responsive and visually balanced on both mobile and desktop after the image removal, with no layout breakage or excessive empty space.

file_operations.description: Remove all quiz-photo rendering by deleting the QuizImage component and its usage blocks (mobile + desktop), and remove any related fallback UI/text. Clean up quiz-photo-specific imports and state (e.g., `Heart` import and `imageError` state) if unused after removal.

requirements.summary: Update Quiz section layout to stop reserving space for the removed side image while keeping quiz behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On large screens, the Quiz section no longer uses a layout that reserves a dedicated right-side column for a photo (no empty sticky column remains).

Quiz flow still functions end-to-end: selecting answers progresses through all 3 questions, celebration animation triggers on correct answers, and results render after question 3 with the existing result messages and "Try Again" reset behavior.
No backend changes are required for this update.

file_operations.description: Refactor the large-screen layout from the current two-column grid (content + reserved photo column) into a single-column layout that centers and balances the quiz content, ensuring no sticky/empty column remains while keeping all quiz logic, transitions, and CelebrationAnimation behavior unchanged.
